triviaQuestions: What's the weirdest thing you've ever found in your belly button?

If you could have one useless superpower, what would it be?

What's the weirdest thing you've ever done to avoid talking to someone?

What's the strangest thing you've ever done to avoid doing chores?
If you could make one minor inconvenience happen to everyone on Earth at the same time, what would be the funniest?
What's the weirdest compliment you've ever given someone?
If you had to pick one weird sound to make every time you laugh, what would it be?
What's the most ridiculous thing you've ever done to try to impress someone?
If you could have one weird physical feature that serves no purpose, what would it be?
What's the strangest thing you've ever done because you thought no one would find out?

If you could make one stupid rule that everyone had to follow, what would cause the most harmless chaos?

wouldYouRather: Would you rather have fingers as long as legs or legs as short as fingers?
Would you rather sweat maple syrup or cry glitter?
Would you rather have a rewind button or a pause button for your life?
Would you rather always have to sing instead of speak or dance everywhere you go?
Would you rather have taste buds in your fingers or smell everything through your feet?
Would you rather fight one horse-sized duck or 100 duck-sized horses?
Would you rather have to wear clown shoes every day or a clown nose?
Would you rather always have to tell the truth or never be able to speak again?
Would you rather have a third eye or a third arm?
Would you rather be able to fly but only backwards or be invisible but only when nobody's looking?
Would you rather have permanent googly eyes or permanent jazz hands?
Would you rather only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?
Would you rather have fur all over your body or scales?
Would you rather be stuck in a romantic comedy or a horror movie?
Would you rather have to eat everything with your feet or walk everywhere on your hands?
Would you rather always smell like garlic or always smell like fish?
Would you rather have the ability to read minds but only negative thoughts or never be able to read at all?
Would you rather have hiccups for the rest of your life or always feel like you have to sneeze?
Would you rather be followed everywhere by a mariachi band or a gospel choir?
Would you rather have to wear all your clothes inside out or backwards?
Would you rather only be able to eat foods that are blue or foods that are perfectly round?
Would you rather have a horn growing out of your head or a tail?
Would you rather be able to only move in slow motion or only move really fast?
Would you rather have to announce everything you're about to do or narrate everything you just did?
Would you rather have thumbs for all your fingers or fingers for all your toes?
Would you rather always have the hiccups or always have something stuck in your teeth?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals but they're all really boring or never be able to talk to humans again?
Would you rather have to hop everywhere or crawl everywhere?
Would you rather always have to wear mittens or always have to wear flip flops?
Would you rather have a photographic memory but only for embarrassing moments or no memory at all?
Would you rather be able to breathe underwater but only in bathtubs or fly but only three feet off the ground?
Would you rather have to wear a helmet everywhere or safety goggles?
Would you rather only be able to communicate through charades or only through drawing?
Would you rather have popcorn for teeth or spaghetti for hair?
Would you rather always have to wear a tutu or always have to wear a cape?
Would you rather be able to turn invisible but your clothes don't or be able to fly but you can't land?
Would you rather have to brush your teeth with soap or wash your hair with toothpaste?
Would you rather have a rewind button for conversations or a fast forward button for boring parts of life?
Would you rather be stuck in an elevator with someone who won't stop talking or someone who won't stop staring?
Would you rather have to eat a live spider or lick a public toilet seat?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing or never be famous at all?
Would you rather have to wear squeaky shoes or clothes that always make crinkling sounds?
Would you rather be able to only sleep standing up or only sleep hanging upside down?
Would you rather have a laugh that sounds like a donkey or a sneeze that sounds like a car horn?
Would you rather have to walk everywhere in high heels or bare feet?
Would you rather be covered in scales that change color with your mood or have feathers that do the same?
Would you rather only be able to eat with a tiny spoon or giant chopsticks?
Would you rather have to shout everything you say or whisper everything?
Would you rather be able to taste colors or see sounds?
Would you rather have a unibrow you can't remove or be completely bald forever?
storyPrompts: You wake up and discover your pet can suddenly talk, but they only complain about your life choices.
You're a professional food critic for pet food.
You discover your reflection has been living its own life in mirrors.
You inherit a house, but it comes with a ghost who's really bad at haunting.
You're the world's worst superhero and today is your first day on the job.
You can suddenly understand what all inanimate objects are thinking, and they're all very judgemental.
You're stuck in an elevator with your most embarrassing childhood memory come to life.
You discover that your weird neighbor is actually three kids in a trench coat.
You're a therapist for fairy tale characters dealing with their post-story trauma.
You wake up and everyone else has disappeared except for one other person you've never met.
You're a detective investigating the case of who keeps stealing socks from the laundromat.
You discover that your houseplants have been gossiping about you to the neighbors' plants.
You're the manager of a store that only sells things people have lost.
You can time travel, but only to moments when you've been embarrassed.
You're stuck babysitting a group of adult giants who act like toddlers.
You discover that every time you lie, a random object in your house disappears.
You're a tour guide for aliens visiting Earth, but you're really bad at explaining human behavior.
You inherit a magic lamp, but the genie is going through an existential crisis.
You're the only person who can see that everyone else is actually a robot.
You discover that your dreams are being broadcast on TV and they're surprisingly popular.
You're a professional line-stander, and today you're hired for the weirdest job yet.
You can speak any language, but only when you're really angry.
You're stuck in a time loop, but it's the most boring day of your life.
You discover that your childhood imaginary friend was real and is now your landlord.
You're a referee for arguments between household appliances.
You can read people's minds, but only their grocery lists.
You're the only human employee at a company run entirely by cats.
You discover that every time you sneeze, you swap places with a random person for 5 minutes.
You're a museum guide, but all the exhibits keep coming to life and causing chaos.
You can teleport anywhere, but you always arrive naked and screaming.
